content: why is it so hard to understand that needing an id to vote is NOT voter suppression? how dense are you, really so if an drivers license is too hard to get you would be suppressing my right to drive if i dont get one? same difference. and gee, what if he does nothing you claim he will do? will you post a retraction? no. you just like to stir the pot and rile people up with usually baseless claims
